page.title: 13THE CHURCH AND THE MANSE
page.content: BALLYGRAINEY CHURCH HAS OVER 250 PEOPLE THAT ATTEND SERVICES.THE MINISTER IS REV. WATSON HE HAS QUITE A FEW VISITORS AT THE MANSE TO ASK ABOUT THE CHURCH AND THERE ARE JUST FRIENDS WHO COME ROUND TO SE HIM. HE FIRST WAS A MINISTER IN 1958 BUT BEFORE THAT HE WAS A PART TIME MINISTER. MR WATSON SEES HIMSELF AS JUST AN ORDINARY PERSON WHO TRIES TO TEECH OTHER PEOPLE ABOUGHT GOD AND RELIGION AND NOT ABOVE ANYONE ELSE. A MAN CALLED McALLISTER WAS THE FIRST PREACHER IN BALLYGRAINEY CHURCH.NO-BODY IS ABLE TO TELL IF THERE WAS A CHURCH THERE BEFORE.HE LIKES BEING A MINISTER BUT AT TIMES IT IS HARD WORK ESPECIALLY TAKING TO CHILDREN.HE VISITS OTHER CHURCHES OFTEN TO PREACH.HE BEEN A MINISTER FOR 27 YEARS.MR WATSON USED TO HAVE BEES AS A HOBBY BUT THEY DIED.
